alert.note: Alert for Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 8:12PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Showers with embedded thunderstorms will impact portions of north central New Haven County through 845 PM EDT... At 811 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from near Litchfield to Waterbury. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Naugatuck, Wolcott, Cheshire and Middlebury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
